subject: Re: [LH] Kate to tour?
body:
TTuerff@aol.com wrote:

>     Ditto Spie. I remember before TSW came out I even saw an AMERICAN
>     TOUR SCHEDULE. If memory serves, it was supposed to open in
>     Detroit, and the Tower Records near my house in Phoenix had a sign
>     up for a while that said "Kate Bush tickets on sale soon..." when
>     they really had no verification of anything.

At the '85 KBC Convention, Paddy Bush even stated on stage that Kate was
going to tour for the album (HoL), but that it would be only at a few
large venues so as to not be as exhausting as the Tour of Life.

|>oug
